concept.title: 5153.303-6 Format for a bid protest action report.

conbody.p: Has there been a Freedom of Information Act request or Congressional, Office of the Secretary of Defense; Headquarters, Department of Army; media, or other high level interest in any aspect of the protested acquisition or action (including the period prior to any protest)?

p.b: Circle One: Pre-award/Post Award Negotiated/Sealed Bid

conbody.p: Estimated Amount (if pre-award):(Do not round off/abbreviate dollar amounts)
Stop Work? Yes No . If Yes, date issued:
Attorney assigned to the protest (include phone):

Lessons Learned and legal/acquisition costs are to be submitted by letter covering a copy of decision. Include information concerning whether or not a GAO dismissal or withdrawal of a GAO protest was the result of a corrective action taken by the contracting office.
